text: Luti ka a ɲa lɔ ka Juridɛn Ba dinban bɛɛ ragbɛ. A ka a yen ko ji kɔ nɔɔman dinkira wo rɔ, ikomin a nɔɔman Allabatala la nakɔ ɲuma rɔ ɲa mɛn ma, wala ikomin Misiran ye ɲa mɛn ma ji ko rɔ. A tɛrɛ wo ɲa haan Sowari so. Dinkira wo ka ɲi tɛrɛ fɔlɔ. Tuma wo, Allabatala tun ma Sɔdɔmu ni Kɔmɔri soilu halaki fɔlɔ.
